# sigsum-note

## Sign a spicy note

```console
$ echo 'Hello, spicy!' | sigsum-note -sign -k signingkey -p policy -n example.com/mykey
Hello, spicy!

â€” example.com/mykey 
```

## Verify a spicy note

```console
$ cat hello.note | sigsum-note -verify -k signingkey.pub -p policy -n example.com/mykey
Hello, spicy!
```
